title._content: View down the main street from the Grand Hotel, Charlotte Amalie, St. Thomas Island, Virgin Islands  (LOC)

description._content: Delano, Jack,, photographer. View down the main street from the Grand Hotel, Charlotte Amalie, St. Thomas Island, Virgin Islands 1941 Dec. 1 transparency : color. Notes: Title from FSA or OWI agency caption. Photo shows part of the Charlotte Amalie Historic District, the first European settlement on St. Thomas Island. (Source: Flickr Commons project, 2010) Transfer from U.S. Office of War Information, 1944. Subjects: Streets United States--Virgin Islands of the United States--Charlotte Amalie Format: Transparencies--Color Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Part Of: Farm Security Administration - Office of War Information Collection 11671-27 (DLC) 93845501 General information about the FSA/OWI Color Photographs is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.fsac Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/fsac.1a33939 Call Number: LC-USF35-590

note._content: this is a corner of government hill. the lamp post at the corner is next to a driveway that goes up the hill. the wall along the front is where people stand during carnival to get the best possible view of the parade as it passes!
note.author: 89872711@N00

note._content: this is post office square. just to the left of this box is the big yellow post office building.
note.author: 89872711@N00

note._content: the entrance to Main Street.  All of the fine stores (jewelry and duty-free liquor) can be found up this street. A tourist trap, but also full of delightful passages (alleys full of stores and little oases) which should NOT be missed.
note.author: 89872711@N00
